Package ulb.infof307.g04.controllers

Class LearningController

java.lang.Object
ulb.infof307.g04.controllers.AbstractController
ulb.infof307.g04.controllers.LearningController
All Implemented Interfaces:
IController, ILearningController, LearningModeVisitor
public class LearningController extends AbstractController implements ILearningController, LearningModeVisitor
Controller for the learning views.

This views allows the user to go through each card of a given deck and study them in the chosen learning mode

See Also:
  • LearningViewController
